_sText:
High all !
This is my first released map for you !
Its a jailbreak - map and I wanted to make a atmospheric map !

I hope you´ll enjoy playing it :P

The map includes :

- hdr-effects and lighting !!!!
- working water
- 24 t  ~ spawns ! 
- 24 ct ~ spawns !
- no fullbright 
- working cubemaps !!! 
- a death~chamber where you can explode, when someone pushes the button
- a combine that heals you
- 3 big swimmingpools
- a tesla~effect !!!
- displacements
- football pitch
- every Counterterrorist gets a M4a1 and a deagle !!!
- a room with ak47, bullpup, deagle and a grenade machine

For Terrorists :

You want to escape !

Every round a weapon spawns in one of the T spawns.
It spawns randomly.
In one T spawn there is a broken wall where you can find a gun.
At the swimmingpool there are two possibilities to find a vent or to be teleportet to the 

weapon room.
First  : Follow the arrow and you can jump through the wall. But you can´t do it alone ! 

Second : On the highest springboard you can jump through the roof and you´ll be teleportet 

to the weapon room !

There are a few further specials but try to find them out on yourself.



I hope to see some reviews ! :D
Sorry for my bad english :p


If you have some questions or further suggestions, just mail me : deatheavy@gmx.de !

Now, have Fun with Ba_Realistic_HDR !! :D


Edit: i´m sorry but i´ve got some problems with the screens.
      I will include them soon.
